input: Question: Tell me a bio of Nick Kyrgios.
output: Nick Kyrgios is an Australian professional tennis player who is currently ranked 27th in the world. He has won 8 ATP Tour titles and reached a career-high ranking of 13th in the world in 2016. He is known for his powerful serve and aggressive style of play. He has been a part of the Australian Davis Cup team since 2013.
